newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Oct 22.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Oct 22.

text.p: Some Australian stocks to watch this morning:

Fosters Brewing Group Ltd said its 40 percent owned Canadian brewer, Molson Breweries, had agreed to discuss a new licensing deal with Coors Brewing Co after a court ruling terminated their previous agreement. Foster's said it was too early to assess the financial ramifications of the ruling.

Resolution of boardroom dispute at engineering group sees director Ross Palmer ousted but his ally Fred Smith retained. The dispute flared over an investigation of a subsidiary's acquisition of environmental engineering business, ABT.
The Courier Mail newspaper reported that the Queensland government would use its 44 percent stake in the bank to remove three former Suncorp directors from the bank's board.

Nickel hopeful said on Monday it was conducting final negotiations with potential joint venture partners for its Murrin Murrin nickel proect in Western Australia, including negotiations with its major shareholder, Swiss metals house, Glencore AG.
